# Smart Building Program – Regional Standing Offer
## Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Smart Building Program - Regional Standing Offer, Western Region
## Reference Number: MX-22720809357
## Amendment Number: 3
## Solicitation Number: MP2016-79154
## Publication Date: March 31, 2023
## Tender Closing Date: May 12, 2023, 2:00 PM
## Amendment Date: May 12, 2023
## Expected Contract Start Date: To Be Determined
## Expected Contract End Date: To Be Determined
## Tender Status: Expired

## Background and Objective
Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified firms to establish a Standing Offer (SO) to provide "as and when required" work specific to DND requirements for locations in the Western Region. The objective of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to select one Contractor to sign a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an "as and when required" basis for a maximum estimated value of $1,165,000.00 over a period of two years.

## Services Required
The Contractor will be required to provide a range of services including:

  - Project Management
  - Subject Matter Expert
  - Analyst
  - Integration Specialist
  - Reporting Services
  - Deployment Services
  - Installation Services
  - Decommissioning Services
  - End of Term Services

These services will be provided based on an "as and when required" basis to meet the specific needs of DND.

## Tender Documents and Submissions
Tender documents are available on the MERX Electronic Bidding System. Firms interested in submitting a proposal are invited to submit their proposal by the tender closing date and time. It is the responsibility of the Contractor to ensure they have access to the necessary equipment and expertise to complete the contract.

## Evaluation Criteria
Evaluation will be based on the criteria established in the RFP document.

## Important Dates and Deadlines

* Tender Closing Date: May 12, 2023
* Tender Documents Available: On MERX Electronic Bidding System
* Contract Award Results: Available on the DCC website

Bidding and Documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; See [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing)
